channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2016-10452|2024-09-16T18:17:59.970Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, memory protection assertion happens after invoking TA termination out of order.

item.title: CVE-2016-10471|2024-09-16T18:49:47.591Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, an unsigned RTIC health report susceptible to tampering by malware executing in the context of the HLOS may be requested.

item.title: CVE-2015-9116|2024-09-16T16:13:16.163Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9625, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, in a QTEE syscall handler, an untrusted pointer dereference can occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9108|2024-09-16T19:04:15.793Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9625, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, no address argument validation performed on calls to a QSEE syscall may lead to arbitrary read/write or NULL Pointer exception when calling a downstream function.

item.title: CVE-2016-10486|2024-09-16T17:14:20.597Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9640, MDM9645, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, PD failure reason string from user PD is used directly in root PD, so if the buffer parameter is non-NULL terminated in Diag F3 APIs, a buffer overread occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9115|2024-09-16T19:01:05.845Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9625, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, no address argument validation is performed on calls to the qsee_prng_getdata syscall.

item.title: CVE-2015-9113|2024-09-16T18:34:01.816Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9625, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, untrusted pointer dereference in QSEE Syscall without proper validation can lead to access of blacklisted memory.

item.title: CVE-2015-9110|2024-09-16T16:24:12.552Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, no address argument validation is performed on calls to the qsee_get_secure_state syscall.

item.title: CVE-2015-9167|2024-09-16T20:58:35.276Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, in an EMM command, an integer underflow can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10432|2024-09-16T20:59:03.179Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, TOCTOU vulnerabilities may occur while sanitizing userspace values passed to tQSEE system call.

item.title: CVE-2015-9152|2024-09-16T19:14:17.896Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile IPQ4019, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 427, SD 430, SD 435, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 800, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, and Snapdragon_High_Med_2016, modem owned regions are accessible from secure side.

item.title: CVE-2017-18132|2024-09-16T17:58:03.400Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before security patch level 2018-04-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM8996, an out-of-bounds access can potentially occur in tz_assign().

item.title: CVE-2015-9199|2024-09-16T18:49:45.939Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile IPQ4019, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9650, MDM9655, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, and SD 820A, A non-secure region check is done while registering QSEE buffer address which is passed by HLOS but not while logging in the QSEE buffer, so corruption of dynamically protected secure region can occur if the non-secure buffer is changed between the time it's checked and when it's used.

item.title: CVE-2016-10430|2024-09-16T16:42:31.006Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, and SD 820A, when executing a TA which has been granted privileges to the CPVC MINK class it is possible for the TA to access methods exposed by the CPVC interface.

item.title: CVE-2016-10462|2024-09-16T16:28:30.541Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile and Snapdragon Mobile SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 427, SD 430, SD 435, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SDM630, SDM636, SDM660, and Snapdragon_High_Med_2016, the Access Control policy for HLOS allows access to Slimbus, GPU, GIC resources.
